file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-26-08-02 - EXHAUST HOSES - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EXHAUST HOSES - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to replace the exhaust hoses of the forward electronic compartment. B. The two exhaust hoses are installed at the forward electronic-compartment air exhaustion system (between frames 5 and 6). The replacement procedure is applicable to the two exhaust hoses. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 21-26-08-960-801-A ♦ EXHAUST HOSES - REPLACE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-26-08 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-26-08-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EXHAUST HOSES - REPLACE A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to replace the exhaust hoses. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 21-26-08-000-801-A/400 EXHAUST HOSES - REMOVAL AMM TASK 21-26-08-400-801-A/400 EXHAUST HOSES - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113CZ Nose-landing-gear compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Discard Exhaust Hoses of the Electronic Bay Compartment (Figure 201) SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the exhaust hoses ( AMM TASK 21-26-08-000-801-A/400). (2) Discard the exhaust hoses. (3) Install new exhaust hoses ( AMM TASK 21-26-08-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 21-26-08 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
